A group of musicians gather together to find a solution, but they soon realize that the problem is far more complex than they initially thought.
A young musician discovers an ancient instrument hidden away in a dusty basement, and through its power, he is able to bring music back to the world.
A computer hacker uncovers a secret society of music lovers who have been working on a plan to bring music back to the world, but their plan is sabotaged by an unexpected enemy.
A group of friends embark on a journey to find the source of the music disappearing and discover that it is being taken by a group of aliens who plan to use it for their own purposes.
A music teacher is forced to confront her own fears and insecurities when she discovers that the disappearance of music is somehow connected to her own past.
